SourceData.Description: Access data on COVID19 through an easy API for free. Build dashboards, mobile apps or integrate in to other applications. Data is sourced from Johns Hopkins CSSE

allRoute.Name: Get All Data
allRoute.Description: Returns all data in the system.

countriesRoute.Name: Get List Of Countries.
countriesRoute.Description: Returns all countries and associated provinces. The country_slug variable is used for country specific data

countryRoute.Name: Get data per country.
countryRoute.Description: Returns data from the country, state and city (in some cases).

countryRouteState.Name: Get data per country and associated state.

countryRouteStateCity.Name: Get data per city.
countryRouteStateCity.Description: Returns case data to the city. Only valid for united states

timeline.Name: Get the timeline of all countries.
timeline.Description: Returns all data recorded in the country, state, and city timeline system.

timelinePerCountry.Name: Get the timeline per country.
timelinePerCountry.Description: Returns the timeline by case type for a country.

summaryRoute.Name: Summary of new and total cases per country
summaryRoute.Description: A summary of new and total cases per country
